subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] New member
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Hi Zack, and welcome;

I keep updating the schematics as the system kinda evolves. I made kind of a 
note book, it's the "Ghost Box" and the latest version is on the group files 
section, in my folder.

I'm a ham too , but the since starting to get EVP back in 2000, I've been so 
fascinated, inmtrigued, and busy with the circuits, and general 
experimenting, I have taken any time to get on the air.

Frank   KC0FS
